Package br.com.summa.sol.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chains
    Convenience class to build a (delimiter separated) string from a provided sequence of elements.

    It's somewhat similar to String.join(...) and StringJoiner from Java 1.8, except it can be used with arbitrary data types, not just CharSequence.
    Checksums
    Utility class to calculate a checksum for a sequence of instances.
    Lists
    Convenience class for working with Lists.
    Maps
    Convenience class for working with Maps.
    Nullables
    Convenience class for working with (possibly null) objects.

    This implementation does not use reflection, thus avoiding security restrictions and providing roughly the same performance as a "manual" implementation.
    Reflections
    Convenience class for working with Java reflection.
    Reflector
    Utility class to locate all fields of a certain type, anywhere within a provided object, replacing them with the specified instance.

    It can be used to inject mocks in cases where @InjectMock don't work.
    Sets
    Convenience class for working with Sets.
